casebody.data:
No. 797,

Misc.

Carter et al. v. McElroy, Secretary of Defense, et al. Alfred Avins for petitioners. Solicitor General Rankin, Acting Assistant Attorney General Ryan, Harold H. Greene and David Rubin for respondents.

The motion to substitute Thomas S. Gates, Jr., in the place of Neil H. McElroy as a party respondent is granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.
